parts.text:
```xml
<output>
<analysis>
<has-cmf>The post contains a CMF number (11240015) at the end. This strongly suggests it is electoral propaganda, as CMF numbers are mandatory for electoral campaign materials in Romania.</has-cmf>
<refers-to-candidate>The post explicitly lists candidates for both the Chamber of Deputies and the Senate from the USR party in Bistrița-Năsăud County.  This directly refers to specific candidates participating in the parliamentary elections.  Article 36 (7) - a applies.</refers-to-candidate>
<addresses-the-wide-population>As a paid Facebook post, this content is clearly intended to reach a wide audience, not just a select few. The post is public and accessible to anyone on Facebook. This satisfies the "addresses the wide population" criterion.</addresses-the-wide-population>
<electoral-objective>The primary objective of the post is to promote the USR candidates in the upcoming parliamentary elections.  Listing the candidates, encouraging people to vote, and using hashtags like "#alegeriparlamentare" and "#votultauconteaza" clearly indicates an intention to influence the electoral outcome. Article 36 (7) - c applies.</electoral-objective>
<journalism>The post does not present itself as journalistic in nature. It lacks objective reporting, analysis, or diverse perspectives. Instead, it focuses solely on promoting specific candidates and the USR party.</journalism>
<personal_opinion>The content is not a personal opinion; it's a structured presentation of candidates aimed at garnering votes. The statement "Credem cu tărie că o Românie pentru toți este posibilă, și nu doar pentru unii!" is a political statement intended to attract voters, not a personal opinion.</personal_opinion>
</analysis>

<conclusion>
<post_id>2299342510466202</post_id>
<electoral-propaganda-analysis>
The post fulfills all the criteria for electoral propaganda as defined by Article 36 (7) of LEGE nr. 334 din 17 iulie 2006. It refers to specific candidates (Article 36 (7) - a), is used during the electoral campaign period (implied by the content and the CMF number), has a clear electoral objective (Article 36 (7) - c), and is disseminated to a wide audience via a paid Facebook advertisement. The presence of the CMF number further strengthens the case for it being electoral propaganda.  The argument that it could be considered journalism is weak, as it lacks the objectivity and neutrality expected of journalistic content.
</electoral-propaganda-analysis>
<electoral-propaganda-decision>TRUE</electoral-propaganda-decision>
<electoral-propaganda-candidates>
  <candidate><name>Lorand Toth</name><impact>POSITIVE</impact></candidate>
  <candidate><name>Rus Marinel</name><impact>POSITIVE</impact></candidate>
  <candidate><name>Orban Alexandra</name><impact>POSITIVE</impact></candidate>
  <candidate><name>Cicai Andreea</name><impact>POSITIVE</impact></candidate>
  <candidate><name>Rus Gheorghe</name><impact>POSITIVE</impact></candidate>
  <candidate><name>Sângeorzan Nadia</name><impact>POSITIVE</impact></candidate>
  <candidate><name>Bidian Paul</name><impact>POSITIVE</impact></candidate>
  <candidate><name>Sângeorzan Artene</name><impact>POSITIVE</impact></candidate>
  <candidate><name>Mureșan Liana</name><impact>POSITIVE</impact></candidate>
  <candidate><name>Popescu Dumitru</name><impact>POSITIVE</impact></candidate>
  <candidate><name>Dumitriu-Mureșan Dragoș</name><impact>POSITIVE</impact></candidate>
</electoral-propaganda-candidates>
<responsible-party-or-group>USR</responsible-party-or-group>
<message-for-police>
USR Bistrița-Năsăud, pentru încălcarea articolului 98 t) din LEGEA nr. 208 din 20 iulie 2015, prin publicarea, după ora 18:00 pe 23.11.2024, a unei postări pe Facebook (ID: 2299342510466202) cu conținut electoral, ce promovează candidații USR pentru alegerile parlamentare din Bistrița-Năsăud, inclusiv prin menționarea explicită a numelor acestora și prezentarea lor ca o echipă dedicată, integră și cu experiență,  având ca efect electoral influențarea votului în favoarea candidaților menționați. Prezența CMF-ului 11240015 confirmă natura electorală a postării, iar afirmațiile precum "Credem cu tărie că o Românie pentru toți este posibilă, și nu doar pentru unii!" și hashtag-urile "#alegeriparlamentare" și "#votultauconteaza" subliniază intenția clară de a influența votul.
</message-for-police>
</conclusion>
</output>
```
